MiniCart: mini cart icon in header section
CategoryTile: a content tile on the page for category tile
ProductTile: product tile on the home page
ProductTileName: name on the product tile of a product
ProductTileRatings: product ratings on the product tile
ViewDetailsCategoryTiles: click on details to display the details of the category
PromotionalBanner: promotional banner with callout on header
Logo: Logo of the company when clicked takes user to home page
LoadMoreProductsButton: load more button to render more products
ProductTileRow: a row of products displayed in tiles with price, variations of colors etc.
HeroFullWidthBanner: Home page hero banner image with a carousel
EmailSignup: footer text box used to sign up with email
FooterContent: content links in footer of ecommerce site
